select count(1) from sys_interfaces
del_flag = 0 and name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') and url like CONCAT('%',#{url},'%') and base_url like CONCAT('%',#{baseUrl},'%') and method like CONCAT('%',#{method},'%')

select u.user_id as userId,u.user_name as userName,dp.exclude_field as excludeField from sys_user u left join sys_user_data ud on u.user_id = ud.user_id left join sys_data_permission dp on ud.data_permission_id = dp.id where u.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') order by u.create_date desc limit ${(currentPage-1)*pageSize},${pageSize}

select count(1) from sys_user u left join sys_user_data ud on u.user_id = ud.user_id left join sys_data_permission dp on ud.data_permission_id = dp.id where u.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')

select r.role_id as roleId,r.role_name as roleName,dp.exclude_field as excludeField from sys_role r left join sys_role_data rd on r.role_id = rd.role_id left join sys_data_permission dp on rd.data_permission_id = dp.id where r.role_name like CONCAT('%',#{roleName},'%') order by r.create_date desc limit ${(currentPage-1)*pageSize},${pageSize}
